name: Almost Recognizable
description:
A small game about finding meaning in an empty wasteland of desert dunes. Look for odd objects in the dunes and squint at them to give them form.

Controls:
LMB - Squint
E - Pick up
Q - Throw
ESC - Pause
Space - Jump

When you feel like you're sculpture is complete you can take a photo of it by opening the menu and clicking "I'm Done".
